unsigned int cfs_rand ( void   ) 

cfs_rand - creates new seeds

First it creates new seeds from the previous seeds. Then it generates a new psuedo random number for use.

Returns a pseudo-random 32-bit integer

unsigned int  seed2 
)

cfs_srand - sets the inital seed : (seed_x) should have the most entropy in the low bits of the word : (seed_y) should have the most entropy in the high bits of the word

Replaces the original seeds with new values. Used to generate a new pseudo random numbers.
